comment: Membership in the range of the ball function. Note that ` ran ( ball `` D ) ` is the collection of all balls for metric ` D ` . (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
